page.title: 16CHILDREN'S POPULAR GAMES.
page.content: Many games that we play today have been played by many generations before us.As there are so many games we have put them into different groups with the most popular examples of each. (1)CHASE GAMES(Tig, Blindman's Buff,Bulldog and Hide and Seek),(2)INDOOR GAMES(Connect 4,Hangman,Lego,Snap), (3)BOARD GAMES(Monopoly, Checkers,Scrabble, Snakes And Ladders, Ludo and Chess), (4)OUTDOOR GAMES(Racing,Follow My Leader,Hopscotch, Skipping and Oranges And Lemons.(5)BALL GAMES(Football, Marbles, Piggy In The Middle, Rounders.)
